description:
It`s Sara`s first day at school, and she`s bound to make a big impression—for better or worse. Meanwhile, Yuna adjusts to life at her new middle school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maou no Matsuei, Shougaku Debut Suru / Tantei no Mezame
The Demon Lord`s Descendant Makes Her Grade School Debut / Detective Awakening
魔王の末裔, 小学デビューする / 探偵の目覚め
